description: Title 24 energy compliance sheet containing 6 tiled CF-1R (Certificate of Compliance — Residential Performance Compliance Method) form panels. Covers building envelope, fenestration, HVAC, water heating, duct systems, and compliance results for the ADU addition at 326 Flint Avenue. CHEERS watermark covers all panels. APPROVED by City of Long Beach (Anthony Montez, 11/20/25). Prepared by UFO Designs for owner Brendan King, dated 4/22/2025.
key_content: CF-1R Certificate of Compliance — Residential Performance Compliance Method (7 pages, 6 shown on sheet)
Compliance software:AURUS (input file: 326 FLINT AVENUE UNIT A ADU ADDITION (AURUS) 08817)
Building envelope summary: wall, roof/ceiling, window U-factor and SHGC data (VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific values obscured by CHEERS watermark and small text)
Fenestration/window schedule with U-factor, SHGC, orientation, and area (VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: individual values)
Construction assembly: E-11 Wall Stucco, 2x4 @ 16" framing noted
HVAC system information present (VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: system type and efficiency ratings)
Water heating information present (VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: type and efficiency)
Duct system information present (VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: insulation R-value and sealing method)
Compliance results summary with proposed vs standard margins (VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific margin values)
NOT SHOWN: PV solar system specifications (not clearly visible — required for new detached ADU per Title 24)
NOT SHOWN: Climate zone (not legible at this resolution)
NOT SHOWN: Insulation R-values for wall, ceiling, floor (present in forms but not legible)
APPROVED stamp: City of Long Beach, Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check, 11/20/25

drawing_zones.content: CF-1R Page 1 of 7 — Standard vs Proposed design summary, required measures, building envelope
CF-1R Page 4 of 7 — Fenestration/window data, building data summary, conditioned floor area
CF-1R Page 5 of 7 — HVAC system information, mechanical equipment schedule
CF-1R Page 3 of 7 — Construction assembly details table (wall types, framing, R-values, U-factors)
CF-1R Page 6 of 7 — Water heating, duct system information
CF-1R Page 7 of 7 — Compliance results summary, efficiency, flexibility
APPROVED stamp — City of Long Beach, Anthony Montez, 11/20/25
Title block — UFO Designs, T-1, owner Brendan King, date 4/22/2025

title_block_address: 326 FLINT AVE, UNIT A, LONG BEACH, CA 90814
